name: Net Theory
tag_list: website-design, web-development, wordpress, nyc, new-york, manhattan, ruby-on-rails, e-commerce, postgresql, mysql
overview:
Net Theory is an award-winning New York web design company, specializing in the development of custom e-commerce and data-driven websites, as well as WordPress customizations, email marketing, search engine optimization (SEO), and iPad/iPhone app development.

Net Theory has been working in the technology sector since the 1990s, doing strategic planning, needs assessment, architecture & design, product development, implementation, quality assurance, documentation, and cost management.

Net Theory creates easy-to-use, well-designed user interfaces, with an emphasis on usability. This is achieved through the rapid development of scalable, secure Ruby-on-Rails web applications running on Linux servers, backed by PostgreSQL databases. These applications are presented through the proper use of HTML5, CSS and JavaScript.

Net Theory welcomes clients who speak Spanish and Chinese, both Mandarin and Cantonese.
